title: 服务器崩溃
author: Dawn_NULL
txt_content:
服务器版本paper 1.14.3 b127
描述:
玩家登陆时崩溃
崩溃前提示如下内容
[16:23:14] [User Authenticator #29/INFO]: UUID of player Daiyou is fb906e07-e384-30c8-801e-a668a691d9d9复制代码

replies.author: yht128471189
replies.txt_content: 不必删除 关闭ultimatechat2的自动更新就行

replies.author: yht128471189
replies.txt_content: ultimatechat2的自动更新卡住主线程了
